name: Dungeon Crawler (itch) (jacob classified)
description:
Dive into the deep depths of the dark dungeon to find your missing companions' Defeat monsters and maneuver traps to find your way to the next floor. Defeat bosses and rescue your friends!

The controls are simple:

P - Map

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

Up arrow - Shoot up

Left arrow - Shoot left

Down arrow - Shoot Down

Right arrow - Shoot Right

*Diagonals are explanatory*
